name: Arden
description: A wise Mage who can summon lightning to attack enemies under control effects.

ultimate.name: Force of Nature
ultimate.description: Arden selects a tile and casts lightning strikes on all surrounding enemies within 2 tiles, dealing 160% damage and creating dark clouds that cover the area for 7s. The dark clouds will repeatedly strike the enemies below with lightning when they are under control effects, dealing 80% damage each time. An enemy can only be struck once every 2s. Arden prioritizes selecting the tile with the most surrounding enemies when casting the lightning strikes.

upgrades.upgrade: The first lightning strike deals 180% damage, and the subsequent lightning strikes after the dark cloud deal 90% damage.
The first lightning strike deals 190% damage, and the subsequent lightning strikes after the dark cloud deal 95% damage.
The first lightning strike deals 200% damage, and the subsequent lightning strikes after the dark cloud deal 100% damage.
The first lightning strike deals 210% damage, and the subsequent lightning strikes after the dark cloud deal 110% damage.

skill_1.name: Entangling Roots
skill_1.description: Arden summons vines to entangle 2 closest enemies for 2s, dealing 50% damage every 1s. This skill prioritizes enemies under the dark cloud.

upgrades.upgrade: Increases damage to 55%.
Increases damage to 60%.
Increases damage to 65%.

skill_2.name: Gift of Nature
skill_2.description: Arden recovers 12 Energy whenever a non-summoned enemy is controlled. This effect can be triggered once for each enemy in 2s.

upgrades.upgrade: This effect can be triggered once for each enemy in l.5s.

ex_skill.name: Spring Thunderstorm
ex_skill.description: Arden inflicts all enemies within the range of the dark cloud with Entangling Roots once after casting Force of Nature.

upgrades.upgrade: The effect range of Arden's Ultimate is extended to 3-tile.
The duration of Entangling Roots is increased to 3s.

enhance_force.name: Enhance Force
enhance_force.description: Force of Nature's minimum thunderstrike cooldown on the same enemy is reduced by ls.

season_skill.name: Elusive Mirage
season_skill.description: After 5, 25, and 40 seconds into a battle, summons an untargetable illusion that casts the non-Ultimate skills in sequence, each with only 85% of the original Attack.
